identifier.description: name of the directory holding the collection - NOT quoted since any LIS identifier need not be quoted

provenance.description: information on the source of the data

source.description: URL pointing to the data source

related_to.description: (comma-separated) identifier(s) of related collection(s) in the LIS datastore

scientific_name_abbrev.description: LIS datastore gensp abbreviation: lower case first three letters of genus plus first two letters of species

genotype.description: list of genotypes, one for a single genotype, A x B for a biparental map, or a longer list of genotypes used

dataset_doi.description: DOI pointing to the dataset; NOT a URI!

publication_doi.description: DOI pointing to the publication associated with this collection; NOT a URI!

original_file_creation_date.description: date when the data were created at the source (YYYY-MM-DD)

local_file_creation_date.description: date when the data were created at the source (YYYY-MM-DD)

dataset_release_date.description: date when the data were created at the source (YYYY-MM-DD)

publication_title.description: title of the publication associated with this collection

contributors.description: semicolon-separated list of contributors in last, first format, typically the publication authors

data_curators.description: comma-separated list of curators that put this collection together

keywords.description: comma-separated list of keywords associated with this collection

citations.description: single long-form bibliographical citation of the publication

genotyping_platform.description: platform used in a genotyping experiment

genotyping_method.description: description of the genotyping method used in a genotyping experiment

expression_unit.description: the data unit used in an RNA-seq expression experiment
